PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06282023-06-22JUS
ActTax Court of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of DOMINIC C. BELLEY of Montréal, Quebec, to be a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Tax Court of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of DOMINIC C. BELLEY of Montréal, Quebec, to be a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Tax Court of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
